at.erp.light.view.controller.article

Class ReportController

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.erp.light.view.controller.article.ReportController

  • @RestController
public class ReportController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is a RestController.
    It manages the generation of reports concerning article management.
    Author:
    Matthias Schnöll
